title: bane77
author: bane77
content: Hi all I had i website in my bookmarks, in it you can calculate X Y coordinates from pub. key, priv. key if have a valid Nonce and much more on one site. But my ssd went broke so i lost all may data. Cant find it on the web.Anyway if someone have a link, please, THX!

comments.author: bane77
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on April 24, 2023, 08:43:18 AMThis one?https://rawcdn.githack.com/nlitsme/bitcoinexplainer/aa50e86e8c72c04a7986f5f7c43bc2f98df94107/ecdsacrack.htmlThat's it, thanks a lot!
